description: Fast-moving squalls or saturating downpours, the StormLine Anorak can handle it all. Featuring theirr BD.dry™ waterproof/breathable/windproof solution, which is engineered to shield you from whatever the weather holds, the StormLine is a fully featured rain shell. With a waterproof center front half-zip and a zippered center front pocket, the StormLine Anorak comes prepared. A cleverly designed internal stash pocket keeps items secured inside the kangaroo pouch and doubles as an internal stow pocket that the anorak packs into. The StormLine's underarm gussets and ultra-stretchy fabric add mobility and durability. Helmet-compatible-hood plus adjustable cuffs and hem help dial in fit.
name: Black Diamond Stormline Stretch Anorak - Mens

specs.value: BD.dry™ 2.5L, Two-way stretch woven face with DWR finish -100% Nylon
